thread.title: Penn West to Cut Head Count 35%, Suspend Dividend
thread.title_full: Penn West to Cut Head Count 35%, Suspend Dividend - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Penn West to Cut Head Count 35%, Suspend Dividend
text:
Penn West Petroleum Ltd. said Tuesday that it will cut its head count by 35%, suspend its dividend and scale back its capital spending again amid weak oil prices.
The Canadian oil-and-natural gas supplier said job cuts will impact about 400 full-time employees and contractors, mostly located in its head office in Calgary, Alberta. Penn West... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
